Finance Department
==================

The Finance Department's mission is to efficiently budget and account for financial resources used to provide public services.

Rosa Trevino
------------

Interim Director

Rosie Trevino has held a variety of positions with the City as Finance Director for 14 years,  Peace Officer and Personnel Director.  She is a native of La Joya, Texas.

![rosie trevino_edited.jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/62f94d_aa7f9b5215c54a5a9d5d7878cc17bccc~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_281,h_489,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/62f94d_aa7f9b5215c54a5a9d5d7878cc17bccc~mv2.jpg)

Department Description
----------------------

Quick Facts

The Finance Department provides support for other municipal departments, the City Manager and the City Council.  The Department has an Accounting Division and a Purchasing Division.

[News](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/news)

Finance Services
----------------

### Audit Reports

![Calculator](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/da73c50a72bc4ea4ba2fb7f20892a464.jpg/v1/crop/x_582,y_0,w_3995,h_3648/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Calculator.jpg)

Texas law requires municipalities to complete an annual audit.

* [Comprehensive Financial Audit Report, Fiscal Year 2024](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/_files/ugd/917925_a2751046c48e40d0a64ea78ff1bb07d8.pdf)
* [Comprehensive Financial Audit Report, Fiscal Year 2023](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/_files/ugd/2f2ad4_29fc4b4b9cd745e2a7a7dbfb6253f3f9.pdf)
* [Comprehensive Financial Audit Report, Fiscal Year 2022](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/_files/ugd/3c0551_21d1d113959d454d833406712caa7749.pdf)
* [Comprehensive Financial Audit Report, Fiscal Year 2021](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/_files/ugd/3c0551_fe9d27a110c4462fb32130ae3550325d.pdf)
* Comprehensive Financial Audit Report, Fiscal Year 2020

### Bond Rating

[![SP-Global on Wall Street Stock Exchange](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/3c0551_fff70b461ea94bc097eb2eebdc8219b7~mv2.jpg/v1/crop/x_248,y_0,w_765,h_699/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/SP-Global_edited.jpg)](https://www.spglobal.com/en/)

Cities demonstrating experienced governance, professional management and sound financial practices earn a high bond rating by independent rating agencies.  This allows cities to borrow at better rates for their capital projects.

​

[S&P Global](https://www.spglobal.com/en/) rated La Joya as "A" investment grade.  La Joya is the only city west of Mission with a bond rating.

### Budgets

![Bill](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/aedf3dceccd24a0ca6c446113a3c127b.jpg/v1/crop/x_384,y_0,w_1232,h_1125/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Bill.jpg)

The City Council is required to approve an annual budget by September 30.​​

​​

* [Municipal Budget, Fiscal Year 2025](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/_files/ugd/b5dafa_a4eee5a19a2f44eeba4da52c2c9d4405.pdf)
* [Municipal Budget, Fiscal Year 2024](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/_files/ugd/2f2ad4_29970d4f0d28480db4fb9859f4ca53c7.pdf)
* [Municipal Budget, Fiscal Year 2023](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/_files/ugd/3c0551_a794c8566c8c4503873b87d6425fba05.pdf)
* [Municipal Budget, Fiscal Year 2022](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/_files/ugd/2f2ad4_b3bb025efcf74970844250d4c3e85e04.pdf)
* [Municipal Budget, Fiscal Year 2021](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/_files/ugd/2f2ad4_8a208aae43f844bbb95d259ad1cbc212.pdf)

### Purchasing

![Purchase Online](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/11062b_d32f3ef6cfae4042a9da733874eb2528~mv2.jpg/v1/crop/x_675,y_0,w_3650,h_3333/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Purchase%20Online.jpg)

The Finance Department helps other municipal departments purchase goods and services from a variety of public and private vendors.  State and local laws require certain disclosures relating to purchasing. Check [City Secretary's Office](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/city-secretary-s-office) for required filings.

​

* [Conflict of Interest Statement (Ch. 176)](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/_files/ugd/3c0551_26df255014764a01a3f8eb91a2e4af2e.pdf)
* [Conflict of Interest Questionnaire (Ch. 176)](https://www.lajoyatx.gov/_files/ugd/3c0551_7b452974fb8b42f0b86276973c4540fc.pdf)
* Nepotism Disclosure

### Public Investment

![Trading graphs on computer monitor](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/11062b_40097529869e4abc802c048bbcaaf4d7~mv2.jpeg/v1/crop/x_667,y_0,w_2365,h_2160/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Trading%20Graphs%20on%20Computer%20Monitor.jpeg)

The Finance Department is charged with administering the Public Funds Investment Policy as required by the [Public Funds Investment Act](https://statutes.capitol.texas.gov/Docs/GV/htm/GV.2256.htm).​

​

The Finance Director serves as Chair of the Public Funds Investment Committee, which guides the City's investments.

​

The City invests funds in [TexSTAR](https://www.texstar.org/) and [Local Government Investment Cooperative (LOGIC)](https://www.logic.org/) investment pools.

### Transparency

[![Vertical File Cabinet](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/11062b_901541c3ff9449f89228990fd9295365~mv2.jpeg/v1/crop/x_653,y_0,w_5999,h_5478/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/Vertical%20File%20Cabinet.jpeg)](https://comptroller.texas.gov/transparency/local/stars/)

To improve public disclosure and accountability of municipal expenditures, the Finance Department will initiate participation in the [Comptroller's Transparency Stars Program](https://comptroller.texas.gov/transparency/local/stars/).​

### Whistleblower Act

[![Texas Whistleblower Act notice](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/3c0551_7992b1f384124d0991db7fce40ab611d~mv2.jpg/v1/crop/x_0,y_324,w_1700,h_1552/fill/w_372,h_339,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/NOTICE%20WHISTLEBLOWER.jpg)](https://statutes.capitol.texas.gov/Docs/GV/htm/GV.554.htm)

Public employees who report public corruption are protected by the [Texas Whistleblowers Act](https://statutes.capitol.texas.gov/Docs/GV/htm/GV.554.htm).

​

Public officials, employees and the public may use the following information for reporting waste, fraud and abuse of federal, state and local programs:

​

* [Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI)](https://www.fbi.gov/contact-us/field-offices/sanantonio)                 ([956.984.6300](tel:956.984.6300))
* [Texas Attorney General's Office](https://www.texasattorneygeneral.gov/about-office/reporting-fraud-state-government#:~:text=The%20OAG%20Fraud%2C%20Waste%2C%20and,%2DAUDIT%20(892%2D8348)%3B)                          ([800.252.8011](tel:800.252.8011))
* [Texas Ranger's Public Integrity Unit](https://www.dps.texas.gov/section/texas-rangers/specialized-units)                    ([512.424.2160](tel:512.424.2160))
* [Hidalgo County Criminal District Attorney](https://hidalgocountyda.com/divisions/public-integrity-unit/)          ([956.292.7600](tel:956.292.7600))
